Index entries for sequences related to pseudoprimes
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Strong Pseudoprime
mathematica: nmax = 400000; sppQ[n_?EvenQ, _] := False; sppQ[n_?PrimeQ, _] := False; sppQ[n_, b_] := (s = IntegerExponent[n-1, 2]; d = (n-1)/2^s; If[ PowerMod[b, d, n] == 1, Return[True], Do[If[PowerMod[b, d*2^r, n] == n-1, Return[True]], {r, 0, s - 1}]]); A020231 = {}; n = 1; While[n < nmax, n = n+2; If[sppQ[n, 5] == True, Print[n]; AppendTo[A020231, n]]]; A020231 (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 20 2011, after R. J. Mathar *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
